name: Oh Crab Arcade
description:
Quick arcade project to submit to Weekly Game Jam 162, the theme was "crabs" :)

there was a lot more i wanted to do with this, but didn't get to work on it as much as i'd hoped + ran out of time at the end to implement and work on more things.

----HOW TO PLAY----

WASD - Move around

E - Interact with things

Space - Shoot

(if you let one past in the arcade game, press E to leave the machine, wait a second and press E to go back in, it'll start respawning for you to try again. :) )
